data.title: Love Actually (DVD, 2004) Hugh Grant, Colin Firth, Emma Thompson, Liam Neeson
data.meta_description:
Immerse yourself in the romantic comedy Love Actually, starring Hugh Grant, Colin Firth, Emma Thompson, and Liam Neeson. This DVD, released in 2004, comes in a tall/DVD case and features a full-screen format.


Perfect for fans of the genre, this movie tells the intersecting stories of various couples and their experiences with love during the holiday season. Whether you're looking for a heartwarming movie to watch with loved ones or just in the mood for a good romantic comedy, Love Actually is the perfect choice.
